author: Joe Etten

review: I love this so far.  Everything as promised.  Only glitch was connectivity at start as the light was blinking yellow.  Everything was plugged in correctly - the solution was place the box on * top * of cabinet or stand and not in tv cabinet or on shelf underneath.  The troubleshooting instructions needs to address this and they do not.  Also you need to buy the hd cable as it does not come in the box.  Once connectivity issue was solved I was up and watching in a snap.  The box is small sleek and compact. The voice search works very well - I love it!!  Was easy to find prime membership free content with the menu. The remote is simple and very functional.  I have not tried games yet as i did not buy the remote.  The quality is great.  I hope they add hbo now as soon as its available.  Bottom line - this thing is great.
